item.description:
It's a festive time of year in Boston's North End. The streets are teeming with people. Let's join the fun by attending opening night at the Fisherman's Feast. http://www.fishermansfeast.com/  

Features include: Italian food stands with offerings such as arancini, calamari, pizza, meatball subs, etc., souvenir vendors, food samples, marching bands, games, live entertainment and religious symbols. We'll gather in the lounge of Ristorante Fiore (250 Hanover St.) for a drink between 6:00-7:00. It's located on the left side of Hanover St. as you come from the Greenway, about 2 blocks down. At 7:00, we'll slowly walk down Hanover and cross the street to enter the feast at the corner of Fleet St. If you come after 7:00, you should be able to catch up with us. The feast will go on regardless of bad weather, but it's up to you if you want to join us if it's rainy.

Let's all celebrate as the summer fades away!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lounge at Fiore from 6:00-7:00
item.name: Fisherman's Feast
